Date: 2024-10-31 11:57
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE Opening  - Kids Around - Dubai Mall
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Please be informed that the Kids around Dubai Mall opening has been postponed and below is the new opening date:

 

Kids Around Dubai Mall : Opening date Saturday 2nd November 24.

 

Kindly make sure completing your tasks as per the plan and marking it marked as complete on Focus once done!

 

Thanks,

 

MUHAMMED SWEADAN​​​​	
MANAGER ‑ RSO	
ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC	
DUBAI

chunks.text:
iman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>; Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE Opening - Kids Around - Dubai Mall

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have an Opening of New Store “Kids Around Boutique at Dubai Mall” The opening date is on Friday 1st  Nov 2024.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

 

Regards,

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

‑
